String.string: Speak to Aarinia near the entrance to Fyrmount.
Use the Firebase Valor Teleport Scroll and go to Elleon at Firebase Valor in northern Fyrmount.
Kill Jirakar at Bahaar's Maw and retrieve Akasha's orders.
Tell Elleon that you are ready.

Use the {@LinkCreature:204#1124#Teleportal} to go to Fyrmount Abyss and join with {@LinkCreature:403#1103#Elleon}. [You can proceed by selecting "I am ready." after speaking with {@LinkCreature:403#1103#Elleon} in Fyrmount Abyss.]

Use the {@LinkCreature:204#1124#Teleportal} to go to Fyrmount Abyss and join with {@LinkCreature:403#1103#Elleon}. [You can proceed by selecting "I am ready." after speaking with {@LinkCreature:403#1103#Elleon} in Fyrmount Abyss.]
Protect {@LinkCreature:403#1108#The Core} from Akasha's attack. [You can proceed by selecting "We'll be fine." after speaking with {@LinkCreature:403#1108#The Core} in Fyrmount Abyss.]
Return to Castanica and speak with Fraya.
